name: Rubber Man
description:
One quiet day in the class room... A mystical force swept over the desks. And a lonely rubber woke up into life...

Help guide Rubber Man through this old skool 2D platform game.   Challenge yourself to get the fastest clear time as you navigate tricky moving platforms, slippery enemies and devilish puzzles.

Rubber Man was made using Unity's 2D Gamekit by 7 year old Jacob,  with a little bit of help from his older Sister Emily.  Jacob wanted to make a super hero game, and so came up with his own super hero "Rubber Man" and his arch enemy "Evil Pencil".
